message.content: We have $b+\lceil b\rceil = \lfloor b \rfloor + \lceil b \rceil + \{b\}$, where $\{x\}$ denotes the fraction part of the number $x$. Letting $b = n + \{b\}$, where $n = \lfloor b \rfloor$ is the greatest integer less than or equal to $b$, we have $n + \lceil b \rceil + \{b\} = n + n + 1 + \{b\} = 17.8$. So $n = 8$, and $16 + \{b\} = 17.8$, or $\{b\} = 1.8$. Thus, we have $n = 8$ and $b = n + \{b\} = \boxed{9.8}$.
